verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Command <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that they put out <S%H7971><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> every leper, <S%H6879><s%> and everyone who has an issue, <S%H2100><s%> and whoever is unclean <S%H2931><s%> by the dead. <S%H5315><s%>

Both you shall put <S%H7971><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> and female <S%H5347><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%> of <S%H7971><s%> the camp; <S%H4264><s%> that they not defile <S%H2930><s%> their camp, <S%H4264><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> I dwell. <S%H7931><s%>"

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did so, <S%H6213><s%> and put them out <S%H7971><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%> of the camp; <S%H4264><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so did <S%H6213><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> <S%H376><s%> 'When a man or woman <S%H802><s%> commits <S%H6213><s%> any sin <S%H2403><s%> that men <S%H120><s%> commit, <S%H6213><s%> so as to trespass <S%H4604><s%> against Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and that soul <S%H5315><s%> is guilty; <S%H816><s%>

then he shall confess <S%H3034><s%> his sin <S%H2403><s%> which he has done, <S%H6213><s%> and he shall make restitution <S%H7725><s%> for his guilt <S%H817><s%> in full, <S%H7218><s%> and add <S%H3254><s%> to it the fifth <S%H2549><s%> part of it, <S%H5414><s%> and give it to him in respect of whom he has been guilty. <S%H816><s%>

But if the man <S%H376><s%> has no kinsman <S%H1350><s%> to whom restitution <S%H7725><s%> may be made for the guilt, <S%H817><s%> the restitution <S%H7725><s%> for guilt <S%H817><s%> which is made to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shall be the priest <S%H3548><s%>'s; besides the ram <S%H352><s%> of the atonement, <S%H3725><s%> by which atonement shall be made for him. <S%H3722><s%>

Every heave offering <S%H8641><s%> of all the holy things <S%H6944><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which they present <S%H7126><s%> to the priest, <S%H3548><s%> shall be his.
Every man <S%H376><s%>'s holy things <S%H6944><s%> shall be his: <S%H376><s%> whatever any man gives <S%H5414><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> it shall be his.'"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> them: <S%H376><s%> 'If any man <S%H376><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> goes astray, <S%H7847><s%> and is <S%H4603><s%> unfaithful to him, <S%H4604><s%>

and a man <S%H376><s%> lies <S%H7901><s%> with her carnally, <S%H7902><s%> and it is hidden <S%H5956><s%> from the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of her husband, <S%H376><s%> and is kept close, <S%H5641><s%> and she is defiled, <S%H2930><s%> and there is no witness <S%H5707><s%> against her, <S%H8610><s%> and she isn't taken in the act;

and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> comes <S%H5674><s%> on him, <S%H7065><s%> and he is jealous of his wife, <S%H802><s%> and she is defiled: <S%H2930><s%> or if the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> comes <S%H5674><s%> on him, <S%H7065><s%> and he is jealous of his wife, <S%H802><s%> and she isn't <S%H2930><s%> defiled:

then the man <S%H376><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> to the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and shall bring <S%H935><s%> her offering <S%H7133><s%> for her: <S%H6224><s%> the tenth part of an ephah <S%H374><s%> of barley <S%H8184><s%> meal. <S%H7058><s%> He shall pour <S%H3332><s%> no oil <S%H8081><s%> on it, <S%H5414><s%> nor put frankincense <S%H3828><s%> on it, <S%H4503><s%> for it is a meal offering of jealousy, <S%H7068><s%> a meal offering <S%H4503><s%> of memorial, <S%H2146><s%> bringing <S%H2142><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> to memory. <S%H2142><s%>
The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall bring her near, <S%H7126><s%> and set <S%H5975><s%> her before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%>

and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> holy <S%H6918><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> in an earthen <S%H2789><s%> vessel; <S%H3627><s%> and of the dust <S%H6083><s%> that is on the floor <S%H7172><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take, <S%H3947><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it into the water. <S%H4325><s%>

The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall set <S%H5975><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and let the hair of the woman <S%H802><s%>'s head <S%H7218><s%> go loose, <S%H6544><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> the meal offering <S%H4503><s%> of memorial <S%H2146><s%> in her hands, <S%H3709><s%> which is the meal offering <S%H4503><s%> of jealousy. <S%H7068><s%> The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall have in his hand <S%H3027><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> of bitterness <S%H4751><s%> that brings a curse. <S%H779><s%>

The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall cause her to swear, <S%H7650><s%> and shall tell <S%H559><s%> the woman, <S%H802><s%> "If no man <S%H376><s%> has lain <S%H7901><s%> with you, <S%H7847><s%> and if you haven't gone aside to uncleanness, <S%H2932><s%> being under your husband, <S%H376><s%> be free <S%H5352><s%> from this water <S%H4325><s%> of bitterness <S%H4751><s%> that brings a curse. <S%H779><s%>

But if you have gone astray, <S%H7847><s%> being under your husband, <S%H376><s%> and if you are defiled, <S%H2930><s%> and some man <S%H376><s%> has <S%H5414><s%> lain <S%H7903><s%> with you besides <S%H1107><s%> your husband: <S%H376><s%>"

then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall cause <S%H7650><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> to swear with the oath <S%H7621><s%> of cursing, <S%H423><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall tell <S%H559><s%> the woman, <S%H802><s%> "Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> make <S%H5414><s%> you a curse <S%H423><s%> and an oath <S%H7621><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> your people, <S%H5971><s%> when Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> allows <S%H5414><s%> your thigh <S%H3409><s%> to fall away, <S%H5307><s%> and your body <S%H990><s%> to swell; <S%H6639><s%>

and this water <S%H4325><s%> that brings a curse <S%H779><s%> will go <S%H935><s%> into your bowels, <S%H4578><s%> and make your body <S%H990><s%> swell, <S%H6638><s%> and your thigh <S%H3409><s%> fall away. <S%H5307><s%>" The woman <S%H802><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> "Amen, <S%H543><s%> Amen. <S%H543><s%>"

<S%H3548><s%>"'The priest shall write <S%H3789><s%> these curses <S%H423><s%> in a book, <S%H5612><s%> and he shall blot <S%H4229><s%> them out into the water <S%H4325><s%> of bitterness. <S%H4751><s%>

He shall make the woman <S%H802><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> of bitterness <S%H4751><s%> that causes the curse; <S%H779><s%> and the water <S%H4325><s%> that causes the curse <S%H779><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> into her and become bitter. <S%H4751><s%>

The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> the meal offering <S%H4503><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> out of the woman <S%H802><s%>'s hand, <S%H3027><s%> and shall wave <S%H5130><s%> the meal offering <S%H4503><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and bring <S%H7126><s%> it to the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take a handful <S%H7061><s%> of the meal offering, <S%H4503><s%> as its memorial, <S%H234><s%> and burn <S%H6999><s%> it on the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and afterward <S%H310><s%> shall make the woman <S%H802><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> the water. <S%H4325><s%>

When he has made her drink <S%H8248><s%> the water, <S%H4325><s%> then it shall happen, <S%H2930><s%> if she is defiled, and has committed <S%H4603><s%> a trespass <S%H4604><s%> against her husband, <S%H376><s%> that the water <S%H4325><s%> that causes the curse <S%H779><s%> will enter <S%H935><s%> into her and become bitter, <S%H4751><s%> and her body <S%H990><s%> will swell, <S%H6638><s%> and her thigh <S%H3409><s%> will fall away: <S%H5307><s%> and the woman <S%H802><s%> will be a curse <S%H423><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> her people. <S%H5971><s%>
If the woman <S%H802><s%> isn't <S%H2930><s%> defiled, but is clean; <S%H2889><s%> then she shall be free, <S%H5352><s%> and shall conceive <S%H2232><s%> seed. <S%H2233><s%>
<S%H8451><s%>"'This is the law of jealousy, <S%H7068><s%> when a wife, <S%H802><s%> being under her husband, <S%H376><s%> goes astray, <S%H7847><s%> and is defiled; <S%H2930><s%>

or when the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> comes <S%H5674><s%> on a man, <S%H376><s%> and he is jealous <S%H7065><s%> of his wife; <S%H802><s%> then he shall set <S%H5975><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall execute <S%H6213><s%> on her all this law. <S%H8451><s%>
The man <S%H376><s%> shall be free <S%H5352><s%> from iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> and that <S%H1931><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> shall bear <S%H5375><s%> her iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>'"
